select u.name,u.position,u.phone,c.id,c.name as className,o.name as orgName,o.star as orgStar,o.id as orgId,u.id as userId,s.id as studentId from student s left join user u on s.user_id=u.id and type=8 left join class c on c.id=s.class_id left join org o on s.org_id=o.id where 1=1
and (o.name like '%${param}%' or u.name like '%${param}%')
and o.star= #{star}
order by id desc
